price: E de Allah é a soberania dos céus e da terra e tudo que há entre eles. E Allah, sobre todas as cousas, é Onipotente.
arabic: لِلَّهِ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا فِيهِنَّۚ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرُۢ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: lillahi mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā fīhinna wahuwa ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
